content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, it's a pleasure to meet you. As the landlord of this apartment, I'm sure you'll appreciate the quality and location. Before we discuss the rental price, may I ask what kind of lease term you're interested in?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for a 1 year lease. And what is the rental price?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: For a 1-year lease, our rental price for this apartment is currently set at $1,500 per month. However, I'm open to negotiating with you to find a mutually agreeable price. What are your thoughts on this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate. Can you lower the price?

I am a student and I am dependable and responsible. I am looking for the lowest possible rental price. I am also looking for a good relationship with the landlord in case I need to renew the lease or break it early.

I am willing to pay less if you are willing to lower the price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your interest in the apartment. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and understand your concerns as a student.

Based on your request, I would be willing to lower the rental price to $1,400 per month for a 1-year lease. This rental price reflects the quality of the apartment and your dependable and responsible character.

I hope this price works for you. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
